ygData.subject: Re: The ship issue
ygData.msgSnippet: You have a point, but after Phobia s ship we got shuttles, subs, and all that other stuff. It might limit the possibilities to just cut off mobile ship

You have a point, but after Phobia's ship we got shuttles, subs, and 
all that other stuff. It might limit the possibilities to just cut 
off mobile ship defences, but it'll cut off alot of arguing and 
confusion as well.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> I think that crafts with limited defenses should be allowed as long 
as
> they're not abused. Phobias former ship would be a good example, it 
was
> designed to hold up to 5 bots comfortably but had room for more. It 
had
> shielding that could be knocked out by a series of missles. (Nobody 
tried to
> destroy it until the preds tried thier dramatic escape. Mini 
slipped a bot
> into the ship when  I wasn't paying attention to the posts. It had 
forward
> guns that had to take time to recharge after firing depending on 
the force
> of the blast. (An easy target from all sides except the front. I 
set the
> limitations within reason, I feal that other ships should be allowed
> depending on limitations. All ships can be destroyed if the right 
weapon is
> used.
> 
> Phobias ship was allowed for months until it was destroyed, other 
ships
> should be allowed too.
